name: GPL Skulltag Master
short_description: This software provides a stable fully free and GPLed master server for the closed source Doom Source Port Skulltag. This allows users to create their own private server lists without the bureaucracy of the source port and gives people freedom.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
